arStrings.szText: Enemies hit by {c_important}Rushing Claw{/c} take {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%+|]{/c} increased damage from {c_important}Rushing Claw{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_9}*{SF_10}*100|%+|]{/c}.
When {c_important}Rushing Claw{/c} hits an Elite enemy you gain {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%|]{/c} increased Dodge Chance for {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} seconds.

Using {c_important}Rushing Claw's{/c} last Charge will refill {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} Charges by consuming {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} stacks of {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c}. Can only occur once every {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds.
